Package org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Class LabelHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.PropertyHandler<IsDefaultsLabelHandler>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.LabelHandler
  • final class LabelHandler
extends PropertyHandler<IsDefaultsLabelHandler>
    Manages the common labels options among the annotations and labels.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LabelHandler​(AbstractAnnotation parent, HasLabel labelContainer, IsDefaultsLabelHandler defaultValues, NativeObject nativeObject)
      Creates a label handler with the native object where label properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LabelHandler

        LabelHandler​(AbstractAnnotation parent,
             HasLabel labelContainer,
             IsDefaultsLabelHandler defaultValues,
             NativeObject nativeObject)
        Creates a label handler with the native object where label properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.
        Parameters:
        parent - annotation which contains the label handler.
        labelContainer - container of the label.
        defaultValues - default value of label to use when the properties do not exist
        nativeObject - native object where label handler properties must be managed

      • onContent

        private Object onContent​(AnnotationContext context)
        Returns an object as string, array of string or Img when the callback has been activated.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an object as string, array of string or Img

      • onImageSize

        private Object onImageSize​(AnnotationContext context,
                           ImageSizeCallback callback,
                           double defaultValue,
                           String defaultvalueAsPercentage)
        Returns an object as string or double when the callback has been activated.
        Parameters:
        context - annotation context instance.
        callback - image size callback instance
        defaultValue - default value to apply if callback returns an inconsistent value
        defaultvalueAsPercentage - default value to apply if callback returns an inconsistent value and also the previous default value is not consistent
        Returns:
        an object as string or double

      • onTextAlign

        private String onTextAlign​(AnnotationContext context,
                           TextAlign defaultValue)
        Returns an object as string when the callback has been activated.
        Parameters:
        context - annotation context instance.
        defaultValue - default value to apply if callback returns an inconsistent value
        Returns:
        an object as string
